subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: It took four hours and 44 minutes, setting a Grand Slam record for women, but Francesca Schiavone was finally able to beat Svetlana Kuznetsova, 6-4, 1-6, 16-14 on Sunday at the Australian Open.
snippet: It took four hours and 44 minutes, setting a Grand Slam record for women, but Francesca Schiavone was finally able to beat Svetlana Kuznetsova, 6-4, 1-6, 16-14 on Sunday at the Australian Open.
